channel.title: Raspberry-Pi on Dan Aukes
channel.description: Recent content in Raspberry-Pi on Dan Aukes

item.title: Getting UVC working with Raspberry Pi
item.description: Steps install uvc stuff. sudo apt update sudo apt install -y libuvc-dev guvcview cheese v4l-utils # sudo apt install uvccapture uvcdynctrl try guvcview or cheese to see if you can see video output(may need to install):

item.title: LibCamera Info
item.description: LibCamera Read more about the new libcamera. This may make some of the following information old
